paragraphs.text: Give up the caffeine and see what happens. To avoid withdrawal headaches — which are mostly placebo — replace your caffeine with something else (another placebo). After a few days without caffeine, you’ll develop confidence in your ability to function without it.
43. Make your bed first thing in the morning

paragraphs.text: I can easily get through one audiobook per week by just listening during my commute to school and while walking on campus. Taking even 15–30 minutes every morning to read uplifting and instructive information changes you. It puts you in the zone to perform at your highest.

paragraphs.text: Research done by economists have found — even after controlling for age, education, and other demographics — that married people make 10 to 50 percent more than single people.

paragraphs.text: 1. Stop consuming caffeine
If you don’t believe in your dreams, the chances of them happening are slim to none. But if you can come to fully know the things you seek will occur, the universe will conspire to make it happen.

Although people think they perform better on caffeine, the truth is, they really don’t. Actually, we’ve become so dependent on caffeine that we use it to simply get back to our status-quo. When we’re off it, we under perform and become incapable.

While I can understand “praying” (I meditate and incorporate some declarations about my day/intentions), having faith is a tough phrase to accept. I think there is something here though. It makes a statement about what I can do, what dreams I can accomplish. Without faith, my…

paragraphs.text: Again, you’ve never been poor. Now you are asking people to set aside 20% of their income not to be used for bills or food. For a large number of people they wouldn’t eat or pay rent by trying to do that.
paragraphs.name: b5ec

ba50fd0e82f8.title: That’s because people who feel they need to make their bed suffer from some level of compulsion…

paragraphs.text: That’s because people who feel they need to make their bed suffer from some level of compulsion which indulged in will make them feel better. Less compulsive people are not weighed down with the little things they have not done.
paragraphs.name: a545

paragraphs.text: I did this once. I was very mean during withdrawals. I missed the ritual. I LOVE coffee. I eat my veggies and exercise and do yoga — please don’t take my coffee.

858fd0e86c69.title: Shouldn’t there be room for both?

paragraphs.text: Shouldn’t there be room for both? Especially if that’s the way one chooses? I can see the motivational value in an educational book at the beginning of the day, but why not a chapter of an entertaining book at the end of the day to aid relaxation, and ready one for sleep?
paragraphs.name: a5ea
